51812.affected_area: Steinbach, Niverville, St Adolphe and Ile Des Chenes
live_updates: Technicians are still on site working to resolve this as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians will work to repair services through the night and are currently unable to provide an ETA. We apologize for any inconvenience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
51812.summary: Some customers in Steinbach, Nivervile, St Adolphe and Ile Des Chenes  are experiencing an interruption to  Television services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
51812.title: July 22 - Steinbach, Niverville, St Adolphe and Ile Des Chenes | Television Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
